message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.MM

This paper deals with the problem of personalized recommendation and social media summarization, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed approach involves deep learning techniques for modeling user interests and social contents, which is related to natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of multi-modal data, including textual and visual content, social context, and social relation, suggests the involvement of multimedia (cs.MM) and social network analysis (cs.SI).
